text: Queen Bee is a 1955 American crime drama movie directed by Ranald MacDougall and based on the 1949 novel of the same name by Edna L. Lee. It stars Joan Crawford, John Ireland, Betsy Palmer, Fay Wray, Barry Sullivan and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1956. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1955 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Queen Bee (movie)
